title: Tempo: Australia in the 70's
creator_credit: Peter Weir, Richard Brennan, David Haythornthwaite, Keith Gow, Roland Beckett and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Impressions of life and industry in Australia, emphasising growth and development. The emphasis is on the great potential for growth and economic development in the 1970’s. Also involved in the production are Peter Weir who co-wrote the script with Keith Gow and Mick Von Borneman as Director of photography.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Weir, Richard Brennan, David Haythornthwaite, Keith Gow, Roland Beckett and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
